content.content:
`.collections`

Use the **collections** resource to create, read, update and delete groups of products in
a merchant's store, you can edit all collection properties and also work with all
collection subresources directly at this resource

meta.description: Collection full name - Max length: **255**
Collection name translations - Max properties: **10**
Translated full collection name - Max length: **255**
Optional subtitle intended to be used for SEO or layout purposes - Max length: **255**
Slug to complete page URL, starting with number or lowercase letter - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Permanent URL to collection page - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Optional URL specific to mobile devices - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Short collection description in plain text - Max length: **255**
Full collection description, may use HTML tags - Max length: **250000**
Full collection description, plain text only - Max length: **250000**
Title tag for page SEO - Max length: **255**
Meta description tag for page SEO - Max length: **1000**
List of collection products - Max elements: **3000**
Product ID
Collection icon image
Image link - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
List of collection images - Max elements: **50**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Image link - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Field name - Max length: **50**
Custom property value - Max length: **255**
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
Optional notes with additional info about this collection - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/collections.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **none** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

meta.description: Max number of objects to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: First entry to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: Rules to order resultant objects
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object properties to return
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object property to query
meta.title: string

content.content:
*/collections.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/collections/collection-object)

*/collections/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **none**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/collections/collection-object) For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields

meta.description: The collection ID
meta.title: string
